head.title: Generate QR codes in {{FileFormatUp}} docs with {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Utilize the {{ProdShortName}} API to create and integrate 2D barcodes within {{FileFormatUp}} files. Effortlessly place QR codes on any document page.

header.title: Add QR codes to {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: Create and embed 2D barcodes with customizable content, including text and numeric data, across various document types like PDFs, Word, Excel, and Images with {{ProdFullName}}.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Explore {{ProdFullName}} capabilities
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) offers advanced document enhancement tools, enabling the generation and embedding of multiple signature types, including QR codes, into popular file formats. Sign and secure PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, and images with Text, Image, Barcode, QR Code, Metadata, Digital, and Stamp signatures.

more_features.title: Comprehensive signature and QR code integration
more_features.description: With {{ProdFullName}} API, you can manage a full spectrum of signatures. Generate, customize, verify, search, and remove signatures effortlessly across different document types, offering unmatched flexibility for your workflows.

feature_1.title: Multi-format document signing
feature_1.content: Add multiple types of signatures, including Text, Image, Barcode, QR Code, and Stamp signatures, to any supported document format. Place them on any page, and manage document metadata. Ensure document security through digital certificates to prevent unauthorized changes.

feature_2.title: Efficient signature validation
feature_2.content: Validate all signatures within a document to ensure they meet required standards. Easily retrieve and review signatures through the built-in search functionality.

feature_3.title: Flexible signature editing
feature_3.content: Update or modify existing signatures, adjusting aspects such as content, location, size, and color, to suit your documentâ€™s needs after initial signing.

feature_4.title: Signature removal made easy
feature_4.content: Remove any unwanted or obsolete signatures, including digital certificates, with ease. Full control over signature management ensures a clean and well-organized document.

formats.title: Integrate QR codes with various file formats
formats.description: Leverage the {{EnvName}} API to generate QR codes and embed them into a variety of widely-used file formats. Encapsulate important data in these barcodes for seamless integration and future retrieval.

operations.title: Understand our main capabilities
operations.description: We deliver a broad selection of signature formats and operations tailored to your needs

examples.comment_1: Create a {{TextSignature}} instance and pass the document path
examples.comment_2: Leverage {{QrCodeSignOptions}} to insert a QR code into the document
examples.comment_3: Define the signature type and placement on the page
examples.comment_4: Store the document with the newly added QR code

steps.title: Guide to generating and embedding a QR code in any place within a {{FileFormatUp}}

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) enables the creation of QR codes in various widely-used formats and their integration into {{FileFormatUp}} pages. Supporting over 10 distinct QR code types, our solution can be seamlessly incorporated into {{EnvName}} applications, enriching them with QR code signing capabilities.
content.step_1: Provide the {{FileFormatUp}} file or stream for QR code signing.
content.step_2: Input the desired text into the {{QrCodeSignOptions}} instance.
content.step_3: Adjust visual settings such as color, positioning, size, etc.
content.step_4: Save the document containing the QR code.

code_1.title: Customizing a generated QR code
code_1.content: This example details the process of adding a customized QR code to a {{FileFormatUp}} page.
code_1.comment_1: Obtain the document to be signed and pass it to {{TextSignature}}
code_1.comment_2: Set up QR code options with the required text
code_1.comment_3: Determine the QR code's position on the page
code_1.comment_6: Define the font options for the accompanying message
code_1.comment_7: Customize the background color and brush for the QR code
code_1.comment_8: Embed the QR code into the document
